EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - API Test Automation 101 (was Web Services) - English - 2015.04.16.Emai
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our Web Services Test Automation 101 webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: API Test Automation 101
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for taking the time to join our webinar “Web Services Test Automation 101”, where we talked about how Tricentis Tosca Testsuite fundamentally changes users’ approach to testing by making sure that testing can start as soon as the first web service interfaces are defined. We hope you enjoyed the webinar and will be able to apply what you’ve learned in your daily business. Your active participation and engaging questions helped to make the webinar lively and interesting.
Click here <http://www.tricentis.com/thank-you-page-api-test-automation-101-2015-04-16> for a recording of this webinar, or visit our Resource page <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/> for more presentations. You can download a copy of the Tosca Testsuite subset used in the webinar here <http://innovate.tricentis.com/rs/tricentis/images/api_webinar.tce>.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Georg Thurner Product Manager Tricentis
